channel.title: DeltaScape
channel.description:
DeltaScape - Now running on dedicated server!
DeltaScape IP: deltascape.no-ip.info Port: 43594 DelatScape Website: www.deltascape.net Please use the client to connect, the client can be downloaded on DeltaScape forums.
Beginners guide to starting the game: http://www.deltascape.net/deltascape-guide-to-almost-everything-incomplete-t2710.html
Videos: Old combat to new combat: http://youtube.com/watch?v=zBgbwCUyPgg Player pking: http://youtube.com/watch?v=E-oycL4MCVk More player pking: http://youtube.com/watch?v=spzjOanuikU Fight caves minigame: http://youtube.com/watch?v=eJLCMni4u04 Fight pits minigame: http://youtube.com/watch?v=znibhPJzj2M Bank video: http://youtube.com/watch?v=SwMDwswpIAA Somebody's 99 strength party: http://youtube.com/watch?v=0w_HP9pfUVU
Features: Working player defence, working npc defence Working magic and range prayer aswell Fully working prayer Not too fast training, not too fast money making Working minigames such as pest control and fightpits 100% 1 v 1 in Edgville Boss monsters All skills working Full special attacks Quests working Working skull above your head, need client Working lunar spellbook (Thanks zee best for the interface) New prayers working (Chivalry and Piety, Thanks zee best for the interface) Barrows degrading Crystal bow and shield degrading Working player following and npc following Keep the 3 most expensive items on death, 4 if you have protect 1 item on
Pictures: [IMG]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/3687/dedi6ll3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img379.imageshack.us/img379/3539/dedi1uy6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/2135/dedi2ob3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/7019/dedi3ec7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img261.imageshack.us/img261/1976/dedi4pm5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img70.imageshack.us/img70/4840/lunarhn5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/2701/dedi5tw0.jpg[/img]

item.title: DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @maulerxxx maulerxxx
item.description:
@maulerxxx wrote:

DeltaScape - Now running on dedicated server!

DeltaScape IP: deltascape.no-ip.info
Port: 43594
DelatScape Website: www.deltascape.net
Please use the client to connect, the client can be downloaded on DeltaScape forums.

Beginners guide to starting the game: http://www.deltascape.net/deltascape-guide-to-almost-everything-incomplete-t2710.html

Videos:
Old combat to new combat: http://youtube.com/watch?v=zBgbwCUyPgg
Player pking: http://youtube.com/watch?v=E-oycL4MCVk
More player pking: http://youtube.com/watch?v=spzjOanuikU
Fight caves minigame: http://youtube.com/watch?v=eJLCMni4u04
Fight pits minigame: http://youtube.com/watch?v=znibhPJzj2M
Bank video: http://youtube.com/watch?v=SwMDwswpIAA
Somebody’s 99 strength party: http://youtube.com/watch?v=0w_HP9pfUVU

Features:
Working player defence, working npc defence
Working magic and range prayer aswell
Fully working prayer
Not too fast training, not too fast money making
Working minigames such as pest control and fightpits
100% 1 v 1 in Edgville
Boss monsters
All skills working
Full special attacks
Quests working
Working skull above your head, need client
Working lunar spellbook (Thanks zee best for the interface)
New prayers working (Chivalry and Piety, Thanks zee best for the interface)
Barrows degrading
Crystal bow and shield degrading
Working player following and npc following
Keep the 3 most expensive items on death, 4 if you have protect 1 item on

Pictures:
